text: Only the old man's room was too much for her. Once she put her head round the door and Sam shouted: "You get right out of this, Rose. You leave me in peace. Rose took one breath of the stagnant air. "You - you polecat!" she screeched, and retreated without argument. Her regime, hated alike by all the men, produced one extraordinary result.
